attributes.additional_details: I believe that the government should help due to late nights,overtime,non stop working and most of all their putting their life’s at risk before others. I always had known the NHS we’re doing a great job but now more than ever we need to show them we appreciate it so why not have a National day, party get together just something that would work but show that the government and the people care Thank you NHS
attributes.background:
I believe especially now more than ever the NHS is paramount to us. Amid the covid 19 after we are out of this and we will be, a day to remember all the efforts our NHS staff and also key workers have done to keep this country running even when on breaking point.
A day to show our appreciation

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
